channel.description: Recent content in In This Week on Stream 'n Share

item.title: In This Week: 19th-23rd November 2018
item.description: Welcome to In This Week, a roundup segment that features smaller stories that didn’t make it into their own dedicated story. MaoMao Removed From Steam MaoMao has been removed from Steam, the developers state that: “The game was be removed but I don’t know what happened. We don’t receive any message about that. Maybe it is ths mosaics problem, so we will soon to solve that. and release the original CG by other method.
